description:
Takayama Haruka`s heart fills with hope that she`ll be in the same class as her best friend Sonoda Yuu as she prepares to start high school the next day. Aside from Yuu, her class is full of unique girls like Kotone, Shizuku, Kaede, and Yuzu.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cherry Blossom-Colored Beginning / Yakisoba, Verandas, and Girls
Sakurairo no Hajimari / Yakisoba to Veranda to Onnanoko
桜色のはじまり / やきそばとベランダと女の子
